contents.text: Thank you for calling Informatica Peninsula, the world's leader in enterprise cloud data management.
For sales and product information, press 1.
For new customer inquiries and demos, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a sales specialist who will be happy to discuss Informatica's cloud data solutions.

navigationGoals: I’d like to set up a demo of your cloud data management platform for our team.
Schedule a demo and get pricing details for Informatica’s cloud data platform.
I'd like to schedule a deep-dive demo of your cloud data integration platform, focusing on API connectors and latency benchmarks.
I’d like someone to explain and demo your cloud data platform for me.
Request a demo of the cloud data management platform and ask about academic pricing for student research.

contents.text: For existing customer upgrades and renewals, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our renewals team for assistance with upgrades and licenses.

navigationGoals: We need to renew our current Informatica subscription and explore upgrading our license tier.
Upgrade my existing cloud data management subscription and renew my license.
I need to upgrade our existing enterprise license to include high-availability clustering and discuss renewal pricing.
I need help renewing my subscription and exploring upgrade options.
Renew our university’s Informatica license and upgrade to include additional data integration connectors.

contents.text: For technical support and customer service, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support engineer for enterprise cloud data management.

navigationGoals: Our ETL jobs are failing in the cloud; I need troubleshooting assistance.
Get help resolving a technical error in my enterprise cloud integration setup.
I'm troubleshooting a job failure in my Informatica Cloud mapping task—need assistance diagnosing error code DM_1002.
I’m having trouble with my data workflows and need technical support.
Troubleshoot a failed ETL job in Informatica Cloud that’s causing data synchronization errors.

contents.text: For account management and billing support, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing and account management team.

navigationGoals: I need to review our last invoice and update our billing details.
Clarify my billing statement and request an updated invoice.
I want to review our latest monthly invoice for the cloud data management service and update our billing method to a purchase order.
I have questions about my bill and need help managing my account.
Clarify a billing discrepancy on our recent invoice and update the payment method for our research group.
